title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: When using the 'Update Test Suite' action and selecting 'Y' in the dialog, it is not clear whether 'X' will be removed or not.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Update Test Suite' action should clearly indicate whether selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in the removal of 'X' or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Perform an update on a test suite that contains 'X'.
2. Use the 'Update Test Suite' action.
3. Select 'Y' in the dialog.
4. Observe that it is unclear whether 'X' will be removed as a result of selecting 'Y'.
